website_summaries.verdict: A light, yet tough bike stem that is both easy to install, making this model from Bavel a great deal overall.
pros: Shorter bike stem for mountain bikes and road bikes
cons: While this bike stem is inexpensive and solidly made, it is only available in black

customer_reviews.title: Understated, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and installed on my sisters future race bike (2009 Specialized Hotrock 20). I am making some decent upgrades to this bike to reduce weight. This was used to bring the bars closer to give her a better fit. This stem seems to be of good quality. To be honest, I thought this was too good to be true. I took the chance and bought it. For the price, it is more than acceptible. It fits 31.8 mm Specialized handlebars securely. Mine came with grease on the threads, some reviewers said that there wasn't any. So far so good, I'm going to update on usage, as she won't be using this bike for another year.
customer_reviews.author: Yolk

customer_reviews.title: Faster Twitchy Turning
customer_reviews.text: I installed this with a riser extension to bring my handlebars up higher and closer to me. I later read shorter stems (length of clamp from fork stem to handle bars) produce Faster Twitchy Turning. I wished had known that before experimenting on a bicycle that already had faster turning than I wanted from inferior entry level geometry. I would have liked slow down that faster twitchy turning. Putting the old stem back was an improvement for me. I am sure this stem may be fine on a better bicycle. Did seem like good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: W. Self

customer_reviews.title: Good function stem
customer_reviews.text: This is not a looker; its just a functional stem. I got this to try out different 31.8 riser bars on my mountain bike which came with 35mm bars. Plan was to get a higher priced stem if I found a 31.8 bar I really liked. Well I found the bar, but I decided to keep this stem as well, since I've had no issues with it. I may replace it with a blingy stem later if I decide to go that route, but so far this stem has worked well. No issues. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: A little change can go a long way.
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that if weight is your first priority in looking for a stem then this is not for you. It weighs about 205 grams on my scale compared to the 150 gram stem I had on. The biggest plus is that it has vastly improve the handling on my bike. The sturdiness makes it easier to control the bike. I'm a hardcore mtbier and need better control on fast downhills. This stem has done the job for me.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Billy

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Got this as it was one of the few stems that was super short and fit my handlebars. It is on the heavy side, but considering I got it for a comfort bike, I don't care. Works great, hasn't shown any signs of problems, and allows me to have a more comfortable ride. The next size smaller would be a 0 degree vertical stem, and I didn't want to shell out for one of those when this was <$10.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan P.Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Good, but very heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Did what I needed to do - bring the handlebar closer. As others have mentioned, it is surprisingly heavy. Really heavy. I am not sure that I believe it is alloy. I suspect that is false and that it is made of steel. In fact, if it was a softer material I would have said it's made of lead. It really is that heavy. Should be durable, though.
customer_reviews.author: Family Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Functional affordable stem
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kid. It's s stem. It holds the bars to the steerer tube. Everything got together nicely. Can't say if there's any issues clamping the bars securely as the operator only weighs 35 pounds, by I have no reason to believe it wouldn't work. 1 star off because the stack height it kinda tall and you may not have room on your steerer depending on the setup it's replacing. Also, if it's gonna be a generic product, I'd rather it be blank rather than having some unknown logo. But excellent value overall.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P

customer_reviews.title: 6 years and still awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: In 2016 I got my first one and just got another! Its held up AMAZINGLY on my Brodie Evolution dirt jumper! I've loved it so much it was my first upgrade to my Pivot Firebird!! You can NOT beat this for the price. Yes, it's a little heavy but I'll take strength over a few ounces any day! Ride safe!
customer_reviews.author: Kirk O'Brian Clark

customer_reviews.title: Product is slightly heavy but works great
customer_reviews.text: So far it's only been a few day since I have installed the product and so far it works amazing I needed to shorten up the distance from the seat to the handles and it did just that it also looks very appealing to the eye and seems to be built of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical for 12 bucks - but no issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a spare bike that needed a short stem. After installing and using the stem, other than the goofy name, I don't see any quality different with this stem and a more expensive Race Face or other brand. So if you aren't vain and don't care about bling and just need something to get the job done, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable yet heavy
customer_reviews.text: Rather heavy for its size, but other than that, fits my 31.8mm handlebar and is really short, which is what I wanted. The construction seems to be bulletproof, even though the threads needed some work before gripping tightly. Branding is rather inconspicuous and stem has been solid without slipping since installation.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Much nicer than anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was going to be a low end product with poor machining and finish. But luckily it is the opposite. High quality machine work and a nice satin finish makes this show as a much higher priced stem than it is. And it works great! I did not have any of the problems other mentioned about bad, shallow or missing threads. All screws worked properly, and fit and finish were top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Mark42Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT use the bolts included
customer_reviews.text: The item itself looks OK. You may see some paint roughness, some smooth-less surface or some scratches but the metal is solid. It is $9 value item i cannot expect more. However the bolts included are garbage, very soft, easy rounded. I would never trust these bolts for life-critical equipment. I replaced them immediately. I highly suggest whoever buys this throw away the bolts too. It took me some efforts to find suitable size bolts replacement. It is sad that the vendor used these cheap bolts for maybe about $0.5 more profits? Personally I would spend $1-$2 for better quality bolts.
customer_reviews.author: SUN

customer_reviews.title: Heavy. Affordable. Not bad looking
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality considering the ultra low price. As others have said, there is a bit of weight: over 7oz, but they have held up so far and don’t look bad
customer_reviews.author: KevCentral

customer_reviews.title: What you would expect at the price.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too impressed with this Stem. Two of the bolts holes were not threaded well and the bolts didn't even go in all the way... and with great difficulty. Stack height was bigger than expected, but I returned it before I thought to measure it for this review. Certainly gets the job done and completely functioned as a stem for the week that I used it, especially at less than $10! If you're looking for the cheapest, short-35mm stem, look no further, this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Marty_5000

customer_reviews.title: Is it really 6061 Aluminum?
customer_reviews.text: Although I can't prove it definitively, I have my doubts this is 6061-Al. As others have noted, this is an especially heavy, "beefy" stem given how short it is and feels more like something I would attribute to a cast part. Three stars simply cause I cannot say either way what this is made of. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: zze86

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this but it was the wrong size super cheap money wise seems durable and looks good, maybe I’ll be able to use it later down the line, but ya seems legit all hardware is well machined and it was all there. Also came in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: neil

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately my experience was positive
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this based on the negative reviews. Fortunately my experience was positive. I was careful when I was tightening the screws not to accidentally cross thread them. The installation was easy and uneventful. For the price it can't be beat. I needed a shorter stem for my bike. The original one was like 80mm long, and felt stretched. I might need to get a 0 offset seat post next.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: The good kind of cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I need a large frame . Medium just is short in the wrong dimension. But the stem that came on my road bike was just too long in the sense that a cheap stem could fix the issue so why not. I changed our the common drop bars as well to these
customer_reviews.author: Chobble Gobler

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stem!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and easy to install. Has a matte textured finish. The word Bavel looks good. Not cheap like in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Kline

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! Good quality and exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Nuts4outdoors

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The bolts snapped when trying to tighten down the bars. This is a common problem in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Dirty Hippie

customer_reviews.title: Great budget stem
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made. Cant beat it for the price. Would be 5 star if it was lighter but for the price that isnt realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Shortened the reach on an XL bike till he grows a little more. Helped reduce back pain.
customer_reviews.author: HillMakeItBetter

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat the price. The quality is excellent for the price. An almost idental neck made by Raceface was $60 at the bike shop.
customer_reviews.author: David Randles

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Hard to complain about a decent quality stem for this price. Design is nice, finish and hardware also good. Very nice minimal cost upgrade for my 12 year old’s bike. Gets the bars nice and close for better control. Pleased
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: I'm super excited to install my medium BMX riser bar (basically ...
customer_reviews.text: Brings back the handlebars on my beach cruiser gas bike project just enough that I don't have to replace my brake cables after all! I'm super excited to install my medium BMX riser bar (basically short Ape-hangers) to really set my bike apart from the rest of the pack! :)
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for 8 bucks!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few months now and it's working great. I love the responsiveness of a shorter stem for trail riding. I can't figure out why I would want anything longer. Can't beat it for 8 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: FiggsFam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cheap price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price for such great quality! Dropped my headset from 120mm to 36mm gave me more control and better positioning on my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Keith L. Nuccio

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do. If you're a weight weenie, don't buy this. Torque the bolts right, and it'll be just as perfect as your friends $100 stem.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: 40 hard miles no issues.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Gavity xc bike with a long neck. I ride more aggrieved than I should on this bike. This put me back on the bike and off of the front end. This actually made it all around better. Added new bars and this thing rides so much better. A little lighter in the front for climbing but still climb well. Descends like a trail bike should.
customer_reviews.author: Cory heffelfinger

customer_reviews.title: Aluminum stem
customer_reviews.text: Short and simple it is what was ordered, no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Torres

customer_reviews.title: It's a super simple part for your bike and there is no ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't over pay for a stem. It's a super simple part for your bike and there is no reason they should cost anything more than $10. This one does the job wonderfully it's been on 2 bikes of mine for 5 months now and no problems at all. Does it's job very well. It's a nice build quality and gives a more aggressive feel to a bike. Better for more downhill type riding. I would recommend this to everyone except only the most weight concerned buyers. But they probably have enough money they aren't looking at this one anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Mishelle Openshaw

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fit
customer_reviews.text: Im confused about how many stars to give it. I was unable to use it. This product didnt fit my bike handle bars. it looks like a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does what its supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: does what its supposed to do. nice product, not overly heavy
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for Budget bikers
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money, worked out nicely. A tad bit heavy when holding in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Newsom

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do. Fit on a Tommaso Cyclocross bike and reduced the extension of my wife's arms on the bike (hoping to relieve some hip pain - seems to be working so far!)
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap bolts
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool little stem. Definitely helped out with replacing my old one. The only thing I absolutely hated about this stem was the bolts. The bolts are super cheap. I stripped 3 and snapped one. All being hand tightened. It happened same the same day it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a more comfortable ride
customer_reviews.text: This unit brought my handlebars back to a more comfortable reach. It is well-machined and installed easily. It did not, by the way, make my bike handle differently.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very very heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy. Could be used as an anvil. Nice paper weight tho
customer_reviews.author: Wade P

customer_reviews.title: Great stem for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a great stem. It could be finished a little better--the black finish isn't well applied inside the fork stem clamp and the threads could be a little better, but for the price, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Make your bike fit you don't try to fit the bike
customer_reviews.text: The XR-PRO was to far forward it was hard on my back so I raised the Riser 2 inches and moved the bars back 2 inches it makes a lot of difference now I can set up while I ride and I like to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Winn

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy compared to the high end stuff but it is solid and worked great for fitting my kids bike to him.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stem for the price no issues and very easy to install. I recently bought to change the location of my handlebars, I don’t like the normal XC stem that puts you over the fork it’s uncomfortable, I like the enduro/downhill stem designs and prefer the look as well. Very nice stem.
customer_reviews.author: Foopa

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews I expected this thing to be a brick, but was a good weight, definitely not light though. Overall you can't ask for a better value. As some reviews had mentioned the screws on the face plate seem poorly tapped, but mine tightened to torque spec no problem. Nice, short, durable stem fid better descent control!
customer_reviews.author: PBurke219

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but works great
customer_reviews.text: Heavy but work great. Hey, It’s only $10, what do you expect!
customer_reviews.author: James M. Chau

customer_reviews.title: Slab of aluminum!
customer_reviews.text: Beefy!! This is a serious hunk of aluminum!! It's heavy, although I'm not concerned with the weight, I know some are. But it shouldn't fail, that was my concern.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: 9 dollars can't complain
customer_reviews.text: Large stack height but definitely can take a beating can't complain for 9 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.eeeee

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this price point. Not the highest quality, I certainly wouldn't put it on a downhill bike that you need to rely on, but for the money it is more than adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great stem fairly light
customer_reviews.text: Works great and was shipped on time. I was expecting to get a product that looked like it came from the dollar store because of the price but I was wrong. Just like a higher end stem but with an off brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Jared d.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get the screws to tighten completely in the holes, so it was defective. However, if that wasn't the case I would have definitely liked the stem and kept it :/
customer_reviews.author: Greg & Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Uhh No good
customer_reviews.text: Rated this B4 and ... Bold stripped out so wasnt able to use. Opinion hasnt changed = not worth the money Hunee
customer_reviews.author: Cabes11

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Bolts were cross-threaded upon arrival, all 4 of them. I've seen similar reviews for other stems in this price range. You're probably better off spending s little more for better quality
customer_reviews.author: Austin Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Inserted a 1/2" PVC coupling with a 3" piece of PVC sticking out of either side for a very nice light bracket
customer_reviews.text: Using it as clamp around the handlebar stem on my Trek. Inserted a 1/2" PVC coupling with a 3" piece of PVC sticking out of either side for a very nice light bracket. Outstanding fit and finish and the price is right. Keeps the clutter on the handlebar way down and looks nice with a quick shot of spray paint. I have a light a reflector, a Cat Eye bike computer, and my garage door opener on this and handlebars that are wide open.
customer_reviews.author: Bonz

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and feel
customer_reviews.text: Doing a budget upgrade/ update on my '01 Haro Escape 8.2 and I went with a new handlebar. This stem fit with no issues and it looks and feels great. A little heavier than some others, but this one fit much better and came with all the parts I needed.
customer_reviews.author: WJ

customer_reviews.title: Good for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: It's good for the money. Stiff and stout. Weighed 203g for this bavel 35mm stem
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Riley

customer_reviews.title: Beastly stem
customer_reviews.text: This stem is exactly what I was looking for and at a very great price. I installed it in about 5 minutes as soon as it arrived in the mail. It looks like it can stand up off-road environments and take a beating so 10/10 I’m stoked.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel La Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice piece of metal. decent build quality, does what its suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: Hoop

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Solid metal construction. It provided the shorter reach I was looking for. Combined with the added stem riser, I now have a more comfortable riding position.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short stems for big drops and step-ups.
customer_reviews.text: I like very short stems for quick response on difficult technical trails with big drops and step-ups. Posted publicly as KTM Keith
customer_reviews.author: KTM Keith

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: After riding a friends newer Trek with a short stem it made me want to upgrade mine. Great price and looks and feels much better than the longer one I originally had on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you need a short stem riser!
customer_reviews.text: Very good and solid product. Provided excellent seating position for my 9 year old daughter on her new bike. Took about 10 minutes to swap the old stem with this one. Price was also great and shipping took about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Bandana Man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Showed up on time and has good build quality and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Jones

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome and really really cheap
customer_reviews.text: Why would you buy an expensive carbon stem. SAME THING. Looks awesome and really really cheap. Well built and made my bike look great
customer_reviews.author: Joao Felipe Braga de Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: but it made my road bike handling rather unstable and I didn't like it. I just needed to get a smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: It is solid, but it made my road bike handling rather unstable and I didn't like it. I just needed to get a smaller road bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stem but one bolt broke while installing and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Good stem but one bolt broke while installing and I was using a torque wrench to tighten them to spec.
customer_reviews.author: rebelngneer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my bike again.. Did not know how cool a shorter stem is... Steering is so much more precise.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great item, especially for the price compared to the higher-end ones you'll see. I'm not a racer, though, so can't speak for its strength or durability.
customer_reviews.author: vano123

customer_reviews.title: great price, looks great on my latest build
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a weight weenie, but still did not seem particularly heavy to me. Fast shipping, great price, looks great on my latest build.
customer_reviews.author: DeeGee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fit well, and fill what i need😊
customer_reviews.author: Jechodan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beefy and looks good and price is right. No complaints here! Fit and finish perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Cool stem
customer_reviews.text: I like it it make my bike pretty aggressive on the trials and it is pretty tough
customer_reviews.author: John Calloway

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and sturdy neck
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and sturdy neck. Good for downhill or any serious mountain biker

customer_reviews.title: good quality stem
customer_reviews.text: good quality and was made very well. No complaints and was what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Restoration & Conservation

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid chuck of aluminum
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid chuck of aluminum. I've put this on my mtb and put it through punishing trails. So far so good, I have about 15 rides on it. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony's review

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice part and delivered on time. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice stem. looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: nice stem. looks and works great. using it for my child's bike and plan on getting one for my rigid mountain bike. don't know if i trust it for serious mtb stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Seems good so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems good so far. Didn't have any problems with the threading like some other reviewers but I could definitely see it happening. Happy so far feels so much nicer having a shorter stem and wider bars on my mtb
customer_reviews.author: Brice Catlett

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: U cant beat this price, the build quality is nice. just make sure of your h.b. diameter before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked as described, bought it with a 26 - 31.8 shim to fit my state bike.
customer_reviews.author: Josh H

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did really use it but looks like it serves the purpose for which it is made...
customer_reviews.author: David Blair

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Threads are the only concerns Item is heavy compared to what it replaces
customer_reviews.author: Iceage1001

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It is cast alloy and it is heavy but I can trust it on the trail. It was heavier than my 90mm stem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction, oddball bolt sizing, and extremely heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap construction, oddball bolt sizing, and extremely heavy. If you need a really short stem, get the Origin8 35mm one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and quality of this stem. However, one of the bolts feels like it may be cross threaded. I was able to lock it down tight, but I was afraid of stripping the threads. Fortunately, I did not.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heck ya the stem looks strong and as described Thanks for the gift a bicycle key chain AWSOME seller
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie L McCormack, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to move my bars in, good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M - S  FL

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Just terrible. The screws kept loosening and when I tightened them, they literally broke.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely not as heavy as i thought it would be from reading other reviews. The only bad thing is the cheap bolts but i replaced them and it's great. I used it on my sons 20 inch bmx to make a mini dirt jump bike.
customer_reviews.author: shaina b dye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Went on easy and made my bike more comfortable. Thank yoi!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a road bike for repositioning of handle bars. Worked as advertised and so far no issues with loosening or anything. I did not use any Loctite or thread sealer either. Only con I have is that the front plate is thick and interfered with adding some additional brake levers. That may be hard to visualize but could not overcome it and had to give up the brake levers....or grind down the front plate, which I chose not to do. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: VyrysTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Good riser
customer_reviews.text: It is great upgrade for my commuter bike. Worth the 10 dollars or so that I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: barney7307

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It's great! Solid and well made. It does what it's suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C.

customer_reviews.title: Good stem
customer_reviews.text: Heavier then my stock stem but gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Measurements were exact, and what I was looking for. Great buy .
customer_reviews.author: Christian Larios

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is a bit bulky and heavy, but for 8$ it is a go to stem in my opion
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Yarwasky

customer_reviews.title: Nice to see it looks like tough handle but The ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice to see it looks like tough handle but The bolt treads is easy to lose treads . Some of the bolt is not fit in to whole treading
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit 31. 8 size Oval Handlebars.
customer_reviews.text: Will not fit 31.8 size Oval Handlebars. Diameter is not 31.8 in circle. This an oval shape and will not fix on circle handlebar.
customer_reviews.author: MaryJo Thiel

customer_reviews.title: ... onto the steerer tube and brought me into a better up-right position to see where I am actually going
customer_reviews.text: Slipped right onto the steerer tube and brought me into a better up-right position to see where I am actually going.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Strobel

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price. Alloy comprised of lead!?
customer_reviews.text: Feels like alloy include a lot of lead! At this price, I can't complain and works very well on my son's new 24" Trek. Brings the bar back for his small size until he's big enough for the original.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tech

product_meta.title: Bavel Aluminum Alloy Fixed 31.8mm Cycling Mountain Bike Short Handlebar Stem Riser
product_meta.description:
100% brand new and high quality
Short handle bar stem suitable for road bike, fixed gear bicycle, mountain bikes, etc.
Made of high quality aluminum alloy Material: 6061 Aluminum alloy
Handlebar diameter:31.8mm Front fork diameter: 28.6mm Length: 35mm (center distance of the two holes) Color: Black weight:302g
Package Content: 1 x Bicycle Short Handle Stem
